column4: doze sux, i've been a micro$oft addict since dos 3.30, through fsking win 3.11, 98, 2k, xp ... i've seen the light now. I've gone cold turkey on Doze and am now running ubuntu. Anyone got any experience here with Kylix? I'm a long-time Delphi dev, so kylix kinda makes sense ... or does it???
yes c++ is best, or look into using python and compiling c modules.
